title: Create a Drip Campaign for New Leads
description: An agent wants to create an automated email drip campaign to nurture new buyer leads over several weeks.

tasks.description: Outline a 6-part email sequence (e.g., Intro, Local Market Info, Buying Process, Testimonials, etc.).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines the content and flow of the campaign.

tasks.description: Write the content for each of the 6 emails.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates engaging and informative content for the entire campaign.

tasks.description: Set up the drip campaign in the CRM, scheduling each email to be sent at a specific interval (e.g., every 4 days).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully configures the automated campaign in the marketing tool.
